merchant_id.title: Merchant ID
merchant_id.description: The unique identifier for your entire gateway account. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this ID.
merchant_id.name: Merchant ID

public_key.title: Public Key
public_key.description: Braintree Public Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
public_key.name: Public Key

private_key.title: Private Key
private_key.description: Braintree Private Key. See the docs for more information on how to obtain this key.
private_key.name: Private Key

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.
start_date.name: Start Date

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Environment specifies where the data will come from.
environment.name: Environment
